text: Weight lifting brings more benefits than just stronger muscles and a toned body. Adding strength training to your workouts is a great way to improve your overall fitness.
name: Lifting weights

text: The push-up is a staple upper body movement in the training programs of athletes, recreational gym-goers, bodybuilders, and those recovering from certain injuries.
name: Push Ups

text: An exercise that’s key for building upper body strength. To perform this exercise properly, you’ll need to use an Olympic bar or dumbbells for better muscle recruitment.
name: Bench Press

text: This is  exercise for your core that can be done in loads of different ways, depending on what you want to achieve. You can also perform a plank at high and low intensity levels.
name: Plank

text: The unstable surface will help develop core strength, balance and strengthen the ankle stabilisers, which can help prevent common ankle injuries.Place it on  the flat side.
name: Bosu Squats

text: A foam roller both before and after exercise helps massage away knots and tightness in your muscles, which in turn helps prevent injuries and de-stresses the body
name: Foam Roller
